channel.title: Changing Shop Yelling and Others
channel.description: How do I change shop yelling? from "get what ever here" to "(what I want to say)" How do I Change the name of my server using pimpscape, Ive changed everything I found..replaced pimp with my own..and it says "welcome to eyre scape" I Cant find Eyrescape in anything to replace it with either. and How do I compile? Just open Compile? :confused:

item.title: Changing Shop Yelling and Others
item.dc:creator: @Wolfen_Sty Wolfen Sty
item.description:
@Wolfen_Sty wrote:

To change the shop yelling, have you tried opening up Client.Java and tried searching for “get what ever here”?
Then replacing that with what you would like.

The “welcome to eyrescape” should be somewhere in the client.java. Not sure what else to say here.

To compile, just run the compile.bat. If after a couple of seconds it says:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Files compiled successfully!
Press any key to continue…

Then, it’s all good. Now run the “Runserver” to start the server.

Read full topic
